sermons.title: How God Used Mao Tse Tung
sermons.description: This sermon is an account of how God worked through and used Mao Tse Tung to advance the Gospel in the nation of China. The late Paul Kaufmann was a missionary to China for much of his life with Asia Harvest. It is encouraging to observe history and see direct links to events that initially seemed out of control and see how, in fact, God was very much in control, using men who hated Him and denied is very existence
